overview: Odyssseo is a journey into the imagination, a voyage through space and time, and an exploration of nature's greatest wonders - deserts, waterfalls, canyon, glaciers, and more. The spellbinding show is a renewed tribute to the relationship humans and horses have forged over thousands of Years. With our faithful companion by our side, we have traveled to the four corners of the globe, built bridges between cultures and brought people from all over the planet closer together.  Odysseo is a singular expression and celebration of this exceptionally moving journey.
title: Cavalia Odysseo
